pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generating Various Numerical Representation Schemes for Protein Sequences // Comprehensive toolkit for generating various numerical features of protein sequences described in Xiao et al. (2015) DOI:10.1093/bioinformatics/btv042. For full functionality, the software 'ncbi-blast+' is needed, see https: //blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi?PAGE_TYPE=BlastDocsDOC_TYPE= Download for more information.
